amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part C of House Report 117-590 to require the Secretary of Homeland Security to promulgate regulations to implement this Act not later than 90 days after the date of enactment of this Act.
amendment.purpose: Amendment requires the Secretary of Homeland Security to promulgate regulations to implement this Act not later than 90 days after the date of enactment of this Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gonzalez, Vicente amendment (A002) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 213 - 207 (Roll no. 502).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A002) and on the bill pursuant to the rule.
Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Gonzalez, Vicente.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Gonzalez, Vicente.
